instruction: Create a speech outline for a presentation on citizen journalism.
output:
I. Introduction
A. Definition of citizen journalism
B. Advantages of citizen journalism

II. History of Citizen Journalism 
A. Examples from past decades

III. Pros and Cons of Citizen Journalism
A. Advantages 
B. Disadvantages 

IV. Real-World Examples of Citizen Journalism
A. Successful stories 
B. Unsuccessful stories 

V. Conclusion 
A. Summary of main points 
B. Final thoughts
